Chameleon:

Chameleon felt relaxed and slowly his scales was becoming green, he 
started wlk towards Mess hall and he started to chat "Well you will 
see... I'm an assistant of Darkfate... One of my duties is asign 
quarters to new comers, check the fuctions of cr's and stuff like 
that, that are some of my several duties. I went to cr's and noticed 
those bots, Miss blaze and the bully bull,  and I went to show them 
their quarter and they wanted that their quarters be close each 
other.. luckely we have them but them were close to Thyphon a pretty 
gruphy troublemaker; Well... I leaded them to their quarters, the 
bully-boy started speak about I don't know what, he said that he 
wanted to know why they can't remember anything and he moved me to a 
computer... he wanted that I found out the answers... And... Wait me 
asec" said the male while using his large tongue pressed a button and 
a door opened, the tongue came back to his mount and continue walking 
to Mess hall.

" What was I telling you? ohhh yes.. they liked answers, so I scared 
tried to win time but my password aren't acepted 'cause I can't open 
all computer's files, my status doesn't need it... He was
getting mad and I scared used my tongue to give the alarm and ran 
away... Most of bots think that I'm a coward... But I don't a warrior-
bot, I'm.. I'm... I have others fuctions... I ran towars Thyphon's 
quarters to looking for help... He's the last Predacon in 
BlackFortres to feel mercy but he was my last chance to survive the 
bot... Later The bull and sea snake started fight and I don't know 
what happened after that... that I woke up in cr's... "
